content: same single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet ch1 turn 7sc rnds 9-11 repeat rnds 9-11 of right back front round 8 skip next 7 single_crochet from right back on round 7 attach yarn in next single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet ch1 turn 12sc rnds 9-12 single_crochet in first 12 single_crochet ch1 turn 12sc first shoulder round 13 ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 turn 2sc rnds 14-20 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 turn fasten_off at end of round 23 leaving a 10 inch tail 2sc second shoulder round 13 skip next 8 single_crochet on round 12 attach yarn in next single_crochet single_crochet in same st and in next single_crochet ch1 turn 2sc rnds 14-20 repeat rnds 14-20 of first shoulder 2sc sew front shoulder straps to corresponding single_crochet s on back bodice to create armhole 2 e g a p © 2007 pattern may not be reprinted republished or resold without express written permission carol ballard cobbler s cabin cobblerscabin@gmail com www cobblerscabin wordpress com sleeves-make 2 round 1 right side facing attach yarn to bottom center of armhole ch1 evenly work 28 single_crochet around armhole join to beginning single_crochet ch3 do not turn 28sc round 2 skip next single_crochet shell in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet *double_crochet in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet shell in next single_crochet* repeat from *to* 5 times join around post of beginning double_crochet ch3 do not turn 7shells round 3 shell in next shell *fpdc in next double_crochet shell in next shell* repeat from *to* 5 times join around post of beginning double_crochet ch3 do not turn 7shells round 4 repeat round 3 join to beginning double_crochet ch1 do not turn 7shells round 5 single_crochet in same st skip next 2dc single_crochet in next ch2 space skip next 2dc *single_crochet in next double_crochet skip next 2dc single_crochet in next ch2 space skip next 2dc* repeat from * 5 times join to beginning single_crochet ch1 do not turn 14sc round 6 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join to beginning single_crochet fasten_off 14sc finishing round 1 attach yarn to bottom left of back bodice work 8 single_crochet up the back ch1 skip next row 2sc in corner 35sc around neckline 2sc in next corner 10sc down the back join to beginning single_crochet fasten_off 57sc 1ch-1 space sew small button to right bodice matching to ch1 loop buttonhole on left back bodice weave ribbon starting at left bodice back through single_crochet s at waistband leave about a 12 inch tail to tie bow at the back sleeves-make 2 round 1 attach yarn right side facing to bottom of armhole chain 1 single_crochet in same space 30sc around armhole opening join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet do not turn 31 single_crochet round 2 ch1 single_crochet in same stitch chain 3 single_crochet ch3 in next single_crochet *single_crochet ch3 in next single_crochet* repeat from *to* around ending with ch1 double_crochet in first single_crochet do not turn
